turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order a vanilla cafe latte from Peet's Coffee on 175 South Farefax Avenue in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order a vanilla cafe latte from Peet's Coffee on 175 South Farefax Avenue in Los Angeles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, one moment while i find that drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like to order that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a small vanilla latte with almond milk to be picked up at the petes on 175 south fairfax avenue in los angeles, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
